After the smoke clears and every shot connects, Train Wreck has some dents.=


Train Wreck: Okay, they actually hurt me that time, and that isn't suppos=
ed to happen. McGowan, your group needs to come now or else they get left!.=
..

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Legendarynemasis@... 
  To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 14, 2001 8:31 AM
  Subject:=
 Re: Clash


  As the chosen guys get ready to leave, The Vile Force arrive=
s, two bots 
  standing in front of Trainwreck,  and one on each side. Vile=
 then steps 
  forward from the front and laughs evily as all his men ready=
 to open fire. 

  Vile: "Oh... Im so sorry but you can't leave yet... your=
 still needed here. 
  Let me and my men help you Realize that." 

  Vile l=
aughs again before his chest opens up and two large blasts of 
  antimatter=
 are sent at train wreck from his dual chest imbedded Antimatter 
  bazooka=
. He then follows that up by a powerful blast from his tackion cannon, 
  t=
ime and space being warped around the blast. THe person Next to him, Methos=
 
  then Flys straight up into the air and activates his double bladed ener=
gy 
  scythe and then attempts to slash into Trainwreck from the beggining =
to the 
  end. On the Right side of Trainwreck Gemini 1 laughs as he opens =
fire on him 
  with his double fusion cannon once and with 2 missiles from =
his shoulder 
  mounted double missiles launcher. And on the left side Gemi=
ni 2 simply smirks 
  as he opens fire on Trainwreck with his ionic fusion =
cannon and three 
  missiles from the triple missile launcher on his should=
er. 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
              ADVERTISEMENT

rms of Service.
